name: kickstand
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a metal part attached to a bicycle, motorcycle, etc. that is used to support it when it is not moving and no one is riding it: The bikes have baskets and kickstands. He kicks the kickstand up with his left foot, then swings his other leg over the motorcycle and climbs on.
Dzurag/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a part on a tablet computer, mobile phone, etc. that supports it when you want it to be vertical: A kickstand built into the back makes it easy to watch videos on the go. My phone had a very flimsy looking kickstand.
More examplesFewer examplesHis kickstand dragged on the pavement, and his mirror was spinning.The Segway remains upright without a kickstand while the rider hops off for a moment.The iPod Nano came with a swivel kickstand for easily positioning the device.
